mapper.select: select a.*,d.name as prod_name,d.style as prod_style ,e.name as subtype_name,f.name as brand_name ,g.name as str_out_name from ems_repair a left join ems_equipmentprod d on a.prod_id=d.id left join ems_equipmentsubtype e on d.subtype_id=e.id left join ems_brand f on d.brand_id=f.id left join ems_store g on a.str_out_id=g.id where to_char(a.str_in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{date_end} and to_char(a.str_in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{date_start} and a.status in ('over','scrap')

select a.*,d.name as prod_name,d.style as equipment_style ,e.name as rpa_user_name,f.name as str_out_name from (select a.*,b.id as scrap_id,b.reason as scrap_reason,b.residual as scrap_residual, b.operateDate as scrap_operateDate from ems_repair a INNER JOIN Ems_Scrap b on a.id=b.repair_id) a left join ems_equipmentprod d on a.prod_id=d.id left join sys_user e on a.rpa_user_id=e.id left join ems_store f on a.str_out_id=f.id
where to_char(a.rpa_in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{date_end} and to_char(a.rpa_in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{date_start}
